author: slive
msg: A couple significant changes to the dynamic mirror selection script:
1. Use GeoIP to select the nearest mirror rather than relying
on DNS country code.  We should get much better matches this
2. Do a pre-scan of the mirror database to see if the selected
country has any mirrors.  If it doesn't, fall back to the US.
The GeoIP.so is a python extension to interface with the
